menu.title: Triple Cheese Ravioli
menu.desc: A gourmet bowl of handmade ravioli made with a blend of smooth gouda, voluminous freshly made mozzarella, and a sharp aged cheddar in a velvet rose sauce.

menu.title: Lobster Mac 'n' Cheese
menu.desc: This Indulgent Lobster Mac and Cheese features a creamy decadent sauce made with four cheeses and tender chunks of lobster baked together with pasta to gooey perfection.
